code: import{createContext,useReducer}from"react";import alertReducer from"./AlertReducer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AlertContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AlertProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const initialState=null;const[state,dispatch]=useReducer(alertReducer,initialState);const setAlert=(msg,type)=>{dispatch({type:'SET_ALERT',payload:{msg,type}});setTimeout(()=>{dispatch({type:'REMOVE_ALERT'});},3000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertContext.Provider,{value:{alert:state,setAlert},children:children});};export default AlertContext;
